Text: You have noticed a slump in business this month. It seems to be time to update your promotions and marketing efforts. How do you feel about this element of business?

Answers.Text: I enjoy creating marketing ideas and promotions for clients.
I may not be the most creative, but I have others who help me bring my ideas to life.
I know I should do it, but I don’t have to like it!
I really prefer spending my time with clients and leaving marketing for someone else

Text: Time is of the essence. You are totally booked, have family obligations and need to renew your liability insurance. When it comes to self-direction and time management, how do you handle it?

Answers.Text: I appreciate having someone help me stay on track.
Great, I don’t believe I really need to be managed anymore.
I’m good at these skills, but still strive to be even better.
These aren’t my best traits, but I don’t usually fail.
See your enemies driven before you
Hear the lamentation of their women
